values.label: Reference price
values.comment: Code identifying a reference price.

values.label: Price includes tax
values.comment: Code specifying that the price is inclusive of tax.

values.label: Buyer suggested retail price
values.comment: The suggested retail price as suggested or determined by the party purchasing the goods.

values.label: Ocean charges rate
values.comment: The charges imposed by the ocean transportation industry above and beyond the basic freight.

values.label: Not subject to fluctuation
values.comment: Not subject to escalation or adjustment.

values.label: Subject to escalation
values.comment: Subject to increase or development by successive stages.

values.label: Subject to price adjustment
values.comment: Code specifying that the price is subject to adjustment.

values.label: Subject to escalation and price adjustment
values.comment: Subject to increase or development by successive stages and price adjustment.

values.label: Fluctuation conditions not specified
values.comment: Code specifying that the fluctuation conditions are not identified.

values.label: All in price
values.comment: Firm price for specified work.

values.label: New price
values.comment: A price valid from an effective date/time/period.

values.label: Old price
values.comment: A price valid prior to an effective date/time/period of a new price.

values.label: Per week
values.comment: To indicate that the given price applies per week.

values.label: Price on application
values.comment: Price can be obtained on request from seller.

values.label: Unpacked price
values.comment: The price given is the price of the item without packaging.

values.label: Trade price
values.comment: Discount price available to all customers except the retail customer.

values.label: Firm price
values.comment: Price which will remain unchanged for a given time period.

values.label: Material share of item price
values.comment: The per unit cost of referenced material based on a given quotation for that material.

values.label: Labour share of item price
values.comment: The labour component of the per-unit item price.

values.label: Transport share of item price
values.comment: The transport component of the per-unit item price.

values.label: Packing share of item price
values.comment: The packing component of the per-unit item price.

values.label: Tooling share of item price
values.comment: The tooling component of the per-unit item price.

values.label: Temporary vehicle charge
values.comment: The component of a price charged for providing a temporary vehicle.

values.label: Price component due to interest
values.comment: This is the component of the price which is charged due to interest.

values.label: Price component due to management services
values.comment: This is the component of the price which is charged due to management services rendered.

values.label: Price component due to maintenance
values.comment: This is the component of the price which is charged due to maintenance.

values.label: Individual buyer price
values.comment: A price which is available to an individual buyer as opposed to an institutional buyer.

values.label: Group buying price
values.comment: A price which is available to a buying group.

values.label: Group member buying price
values.comment: A special price given to a member of a buying group.

values.label: Pre-payment price
values.comment: A special price if pre-payment is made for the article ordered.

values.label: Retail price - excluding taxes
values.comment: Retail price not including any applicable taxes.

values.label: Suggested retail price - excluding taxes
values.comment: Suggested retail price not including any applicable taxes.

values.label: Agreed minimum price
values.comment: The minimum price agreed between trading partners.

values.label: Statutory minimum retail price
values.comment: The legal minimum retail price.

values.label: Cost reimbursement price
values.comment: A code to indicate that the price represents the reimbursement of the actual costs incurred.

values.label: Market price
values.comment: A code to indicate that the given price is applicable under normal competitive conditions.

values.label: Open tender price
values.comment: A code to indicate that the price mentioned has been submitted in the context of an open tender.

values.label: Base price
values.comment: The base price of a product or service.

values.label: Base price difference
values.comment: The difference in price against a base price.

values.label: Adjustable price prior to acceptance
values.comment: A price which can be adjusted due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

values.label: Revisable price after acceptance
values.comment: A price which can be revised due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order and the date of delivery.

values.label: Provisional ceiling price
values.comment: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded.

values.label: Adjustable provisional ceiling price
values.comment: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded but which can be adjusted due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

values.label: Revisable provisional ceiling price
values.comment: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded but is revisable due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order through to the date of delivery.

values.label: Revisable provisional price
values.comment: A provisional price which is revisable due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order and the date of delivery.

values.label: Adjustable provisional price
values.comment: A provisional price which is adjustable due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

values.label: Area price
values.comment: Price connected to a geographical area.

values.label: Area system price
values.comment: A basis price applied to a geographic area.

values.label: Special balance regulation price
values.comment: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a special balance regulation.

values.label: Balance regulation price
values.comment: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a balance regulation.

values.label: Upward balance regulation price
values.comment: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of an upward balance regulation.

values.label: Downward balance regulation price
values.comment: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a downward balance regulation.

values.label: Agreed minimum retail price
values.comment: The agreed minimum retail price for an article.

values.label: Marked retail price
values.comment: The retail price of a product which has been marked on the products packaging.

values.label: Active ingredient
values.comment: Code specifying that price is based on the active ingredient.

values.label: Alternate price
values.comment: A substitute cost.

values.label: Advice price
values.comment: Code specifying an advice price.

values.label: Broker price
values.comment: Code specifying a broker price.

values.label: Catalogue price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified in a catalogue.

values.label: Current domestic value
values.comment: The present worth of a thing which comes from one's homeland, in terms of money or goods.

values.label: Contract price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product/service as agreed in a contract between parties.

values.label: Current price
values.comment: Price at time of transaction, but subject to future change.

values.label: Consumer unit
values.comment: Code specifying that the price is based on consumer unit.

values.label: Confirmed unit price
values.comment: The value of a single item that proves to be correct.

values.label: Declared customs unit value
values.comment: A clearly known duty on a single item which is imposed by law.

values.label: Dealer adjusted price
values.comment: The necessary or desirable changes that the sales agency makes with respect to the value of the product.

values.label: Distributor price
values.comment: The cost associated with the agency that markets goods.

values.label: Discount price
values.comment: A reduction from the usual list value.

values.label: Dealer price
values.comment: Code specifying a dealer price.

values.label: Discount amount allowed
values.comment: A certain price up to which one is able to make reductions from the usual list value.

values.label: ECSC price
values.comment: Price registered at European Commission Steel and Carbon office (DG III).

values.label: Estimated price
values.comment: Code specifying an estimated price.

values.label: Expected unit price
values.comment: The anticipated value of a single item.

values.label: Freight/charge rate
values.comment: The price that is either a freight rate or a rate on which freight charges are calculated.

values.label: Gross unit price
values.comment: Unit price to which allowances and charges apply.

values.label: Invoice price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified on an invoice.

values.label: Labelling price
values.comment: Retail price of the buyer that should be printed by the producer on the article's label. The labelling price is not necessary the effective retail price.

values.label: Maximum order quantity price
values.comment: The greatest amount of goods or services which one can buy to receive a certain value.

values.label: Minimum order quantity price
values.comment: The least amount of goods or services that one can buy to receive a certain value.

values.label: Minimum release quantity price
values.comment: The least amount of an order one can place in order to receive a certain value.

values.label: Manufacturer's suggested retail
values.comment: Price that reflects "Sales to other manufacturers" or "Sales for resale".

values.label: Maximum release quantity price
values.comment: The greatest amount of an order that one can place in order to receive a certain value.

values.label: Not-to-exceed price
values.comment: Code specifying a price that cannot be increased.

values.label: No quote
values.comment: No price available.

values.label: Net unit price
values.comment: Unit price to which no allowances and charges apply.

values.label: Net weight
values.comment: Code specifying a net weight price.

values.label: Ocean freight rate
values.comment: The price per pricing unit of ocean transportation services for moving cargo from one location to another.

values.label: Price break quantity(s)
values.comment: Numerical amounts of goods or services which are associated with different sums of money. As the amount goes up, the price per individual item decreases.

values.label: Unit price beginning quantity
values.comment: The starting amount at which you can place a value on a single item.

values.label: Prepaid freight charges
values.comment: The cost of shipping is paid before the goods are shipped.

values.label: Provisional price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product as provisionally agreed.

values.label: Producer's price
values.comment: The value that the maker of a good places on an item.

values.label: Promotional price
values.comment: The value that is placed on an item that is being developed. The idea is to sell this product for less than one normally would, and make up for it by selling a larger quantity.

values.label: Gross weight
values.comment: Code specifying a gross weight price.

values.label: Quote price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified in a quote.

values.label: Resale price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product to be used for resale.

values.label: Retail price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product to be used for retail.

values.label: Ship and debit
values.comment: To transport goods and be owed money by the customer for the services performed.

values.label: Suggested retail price
values.comment: Price per unit of quantity of a product suggested for retail.

values.label: Gross weight without wooden pallets
values.comment: Used in steel industry.

values.label: To be negotiated
values.comment: Code specifying that the price has to be negotiated.

values.label: Transfer
values.comment: To carry or remove from one place, situation, or person to another.

values.label: Traded unit
values.comment: Code specifying a traded unit price.

values.label: Theoretical weight
values.comment: Code specifying a price based on a theoretical weight.

values.label: Wholesale price
values.comment: Code specifying a wholesale price.
